intro.description: This cheat sheet will walk you through the steps involved in declaring a Virtual Organisation (VO).

item.title: Open the VO Declaration Dialog Box
item.description: Go to Window > Preferences, expand the g-Eclipse sub-tree and select VO-Declarations. You can click the Click to Perform button to have the Preferences dialog box open automatically.

item.title: Add a Virtual Organisation
item.description:
To add a Virtual Organisation, click on the Add button.
In the dialog that opens, put in the VO specific settings such as Name, Host, Port number, Host DN, and Information System Endpoint. Click Finish when done.

item.title: Complete the declaration process
item.description: Back in the VO-Declarations Preference Page, select the VO that you just created and click OK to complete the process.
